name: travel-planner-fullstack
description: Travel Planner Application - Full Stack with Django and Ionic

scripts.start:backend: cd django/backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver
scripts.install:backend: cd django/backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install django djangorestframework django-cors-headers
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
